definition: autumn trial (judicial hearing of capital cases during Ming and Qing)

sentences.english: The procedure of the autumn trial system was strict , include local autumn trial with central autumn trial .
sentences.chinese: 秋審制度程序嚴格，包括地方秋審和中央秋審。
